comment: Great professor. Very helpful, very responsive. Always willing to answer questions outside of class time. With that said, the class was pretty hard, a lot of info to digest. Her tests were written like the LSAT is probably written. be ready for the tests. As long as you do all the other work, you will be fine.

Professor Dutcher is the best. She is knowledgeable, easy to communicate with, & cares about her students. She offers different learning tools which helped relate the material to real life and made it easier to understand. The tests are HARD, but she gives feedback, tips on how to improve and opportunities for extra credit!

She allows you to create your syllabus. If everyone in class agrees to have an open notes test, she will allow.  She is also very caring and gives great feedback to your assignment. The tests are hard, but if you read the textbook and have it open when you take it, you should do well. Weekly discussion, smartbook on Connect, 4 test, and final paper
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Such an Easy A! Just turn the work in on time and you're set. Everything is open book open note. Professor Dutcher is so sweet too! Gives you a lot of resources to succeed and even sends congratulatory emails on your exam. Responds really quick. This class was not stressful at all, it was a breeze. If you don't get an A, something's wrong with you.
Professor Dutcher makes this class a breeze. Engaging lectures, flexible class structure, and easy assessments. I found unstuck study super helpful for exam prep - saved me tons of time.

She the best professor. Her tests are open note/no lockdown. But some questions on test won't be on online "resources". Very easy grader that her project is very fun to do. Take her if you don't like tests that are webcam/lockdown because she makes her class very stress free and accommodating.

A great teacher, she knows what she is teaching and was always very prompt with returning emails, always open for discussion, and gave plenty of extra credit along the way, I would take her for additional classes and would recommend her, the class was well laid out and followed along the syllabus, test were from the studied material.
She is amazing overall. She lets the class chose syllabus criteria including what will be allowed to use on tests. Very minimal effort and EASY A.

Great professor! She is super nice, and the assignments are all easy and pretty much just a completion grade for everything (Including Smartbooks! It doesn't matter what you make on it, as long as you complete it). Your class will decide on how everything is weighted (grading wise), word count for assignments, and whether or not tests are open book

OVERALL AMAZING!!!! Tests are online with no lockdown! Roleplay's are easy to do and the final project is a total breeze. Accessible and open to schedule one on one if need be. Let's students choose class guidelines and syllabus. Take her if you can it is an EASY A!!!!!!

Very energetic and enjoyable professor, went through each chapter step-by-step & made an effort to be transparent about tested material. Group roleplay assignments were frustrating at times but overall uncomplicated, and she made an effort to keep everyone engaged for such a long class. Dense material, online HW & exams, overall good class.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Dutcher is one of the best professors I have ever had. She is super knowledgeable and very caring. You will do roleplays in groups during class, but they are very straightforward and you learn a lot! I can't recommend Dutcher enough. TAKE HER!!
Awesome professor. Just take her!

Professor Dutcher was so amazing! Fight to get into her class! She really makes learning the material fun and relatable. She allowed us to vote on how we would be graded and how the class was run. All of our exams were open not with multiple extra credit opportunities. You would have to try to do poorly in this class!

Christen is AWESOME! I would take her again ten times. She is very kind and cares for her students, even sends out congratulation emails for good grades, etc. Clearly goes the extra mile. The entire class is opinion based, you can not go wrong.

Very easy course to take in the summer but it is very homework and reading heavy. You select your course policies at the beginning of the semester and chose your grading scale as well. If you do everything including the bonus quizzes for bonus points, there is absolutely no way you'll fail this class. Awesome professor, great energy.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: Prof Dutcher is EASILY the best prof I've had at KSU. Pick your own assignment weights, uses MCGHill, and tests are straightforward. Super caring and constant reminders of due dates so it's easy to stay on track. Honestly looking for another opportunity to take her again because she was THAT great!!

If your a business major or need to take BLAW 2200 this professor is the one for you. This class is very straight forward and if you read the text and show up for class you will have no problems. The tests are not difficult and she gives plenty of opportunities for extra credit. There are role play activities you should show up for. Great class!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback

comment: One of the best teachers. Her lectures were engaging and informative. She lets the class vote on the "Class Policies" at the beginning, such as the grading policy and make-up policy. The written assignment option will seem like the best. However, your class should choose the Test Heavy option as all tests are online. Either way, it's an easy A.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: TAKE HER CLASS! Professor Dutcher is such a caring and wonderful professor. She will work with you and help you succeed in any way she can. She is empathetic and her class is so easy to understand. 90% of the class is through connect, you pick your course policies, makeup work is allowed. Take her class you wont regret it!
The best and sweetest professor ever.

This professor is wonderful! She is very accessible, and makes it easy to feel heard even for shy people. Very caring, and a very fair grader. There are weekly assignments, but nothing that isn't manageable.

Took professor Cristen Dutcher for online BLAW. She was so amazing and helpful. Professor Cristen Dutcher truly wanted you to succeed in the class and cared about your grade. She was always willing to help and let you make up certain assignments when needed.

AMAZING. Professor Dutcher truly cares about her students and WANTS them to succeed. Everything on the test was covered in the textbook, Connect assignments, discussions, material, AND practice quizzes. AND SHE PROVIDES EXTRA CREDIT. There is truly no way to do bad in this class unless you are completely lazy.
No proctored exam.
Free final answers.
Super easy. She gives out lots of extra credit. She also lets you outline your class, how grades are weighted, etc. I always hear how awful BLAW is, but she made the class a breeze.

She is one of the most enthusiastic professors I've had. The class is not hard, and as long as you do your online homework and show up for occasional in class grades and do the tests, you will succeed. Her lectures aren't mandatory but worth attending, as she is clearly very knowledgeable and a good communicator. The in class assignments were fun.

If you fail this class it's literally all your fault. Professor Dutcher is one of the best professors I have had. She is kind and KNOWS HER STUFF. Attendance is not mandatory, but she is a very good teacher so why not attend? She literally sets this class up so that you won't fail.

Absolutely take Professor Dutcher!  She is awesome, and it was a pleasure taking her this semester.  She allows the class to choose their own policies, so depending on your class, all of your tests may be open book.  Tests shouldn't be a problem, she offers plenty of extra credit, and weekly assignments and participation are straightforward.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Do yourself a favor and take her. She is the best prof i have ever had here in KSU and she makes you WANT to be there. In the beginning of the semester, she lets you chose class policies as a class. If you class choses well, then youll have open book/notes Exams. Weekly Smartbook assignments, role-play w/ a written response. Super easy take her!!!!

I love her she is a great professor very accesible. The class gets to decide the class policies and the grading scale. She responds in a timely manner.

TAKE HER!

TAKE HER! Professor Dutcher is amazing. She lets the class decide how the classes will be graded. There were SmartBook assignments, discussions, exams, and a final. The SB and discussions counted more towards the grade than the actual exams. The tests are a little difficult but she lets you have your notes and the textbook to help during the exam.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: TAKE HER!!! A great class if you pay attention and the discussions are quite fun! She let us vote on our syllabus policies so all tests were open-book and exams werent worth much. She even encouraged having the book in another window while taking a test. Uses homework system so impossible to fail. Sweet woman who just wants to see us succeed.

We got to choose how we were graded and we chose open note and open book for all the tests. The tests were easy with that help. The only time you have to show up is for the Role Play activities and as long as you follow her instructions you should get a good grade. Also, she gives out extra credit. She got back to my emails quickly as well.

The best professor I've had since starting school. The tests were open book/notes. There's a good bit of reading but of course it can't all be easy. Also, a ton of extra credit so there's no excuse for failing her class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Dutcher is a really sweet and caring professor who wants her students to suceed. She is easily asscessible both in class and out of class. She explains concepts really well and she encourages the class to paricipate and ask questions, and she is not a harsh grader. If you are looking for an easy BLAW class, this is it!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: She's a great teacher and an easy grader. Let's the class set the grading criteria by voting. Lots of extra credit. Tests are open book/notes, and papers (only 350 words explaining the role-play in class) graded on completion and meeting rubric guidelines. One of the best classes, and teachers, at KSU.
Very easy with a great professor. There is no one else I would rather take. 100% take this professor if you can.

She literally made BLAW an interesting subject. She also let our class decide our course policies. Its not a hard class and shes very understanding. Just do the work and try, you should pass with an A. One of the best professors Ive had. You dont even have to go to class to succeed.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Dutcher is very laid back compared to the professors Ive had before. She really does care about her students and you can tell she is really passionate about the class. Easy material to learn and fun classes!

Professor Dutcher is very organized, helpful, and talented. The course content includes a discussion and a SB activity each week. There is an exam every three weeks. Professor Dutcher gives many chances for extra credit as well. As long as you read the textbook chapters and watch her recap videos, you are guaranteed an A in this course.

I'm not a morning person, but I took Professor Dutcher at 9am and it was worth it! She may be the best professor at KSU. She allowed our class to choose our own course policies (ie: using notes on exams, how much exams were weighted, word count for assignments). You can tell she cares about her students/their success. Easy A. Take her!!!

One of the easiest classes Ive ever taken. Simply do your work and youll be prepared for the test and quizzes and get an easy A. Shes very respectful of her students and communicates very clearly. Also, has a very structured and easily understandable layout of the course.

I was scared to take this class, but professor Dutcher makes it super easy to get an A. I certainly enjoyed the class way more than I expected too. This class has a bit of homework (via connect) and there's a quiz every week. Just read the textbook/take notes and you'll do great. Also a lot of bonus points opportunities.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: I had a ton of family issues this semester and missed many assignments. I was able to contact her & she was SO accommodating and sweet. She told me what grade I would need to receive on our last test to pass and even gave me encouragement and offered help with topics that i had missed. Material can be difficult but nothing outrageous. Take her!!
Take this professor!!

This class was moved online at the last minute due to the pandemic, but she made it as easy as possible to earn a good grade in this class. As typical with any law class, you have to read and take good notes. All tests are open note with extra credit opportunities. Two weekly textbook assignments. Responds to emails fast and is easy to reach!

Best professor ever! So sweet and caring. Discussions every week, 4 exams, and a final. Exams were lockdown, but you could have notes. Several extra credit assignments. TAKE HER!! The whole class loved her.

Made a B cause I missed a few assignments. Prof. Dutcher is great. Very understanding. Cares about you as a student and as a person. Open notes tests x4, reading hw assignments, fun disc. posts, final. Extra cred available. V. straight forward course. Put in the effort & you will get an A.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: It was a rough semester for me, so it was truly a blessing that I had Professor Dutcher to give a helping hand when I needed it. One of those professors that truly cares for her students and will go out of her way for them. Just get your assignments done and you will succeed in this course.

Cares very much about her students. Gives tons of extra credit opportunities. Smartbook assignment due on Monday, discussion post due on Thursday. Test every 3 chapters. Test can be somewhat tough but take good notes on the Smartbook reading and not a problem at all. Take her with no worries.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: She is my favorite professor this semester! She is so enthusiastic and knows the material really well. The first test can be hard, but once you get how it is going, you will do great. There is a weekly SB assignment and ABA. There is I think 5 tests altogether. They are all proctored, but open notes. Also, there are extra credit opportunities.

Wow, what else can I say that everyone else hasn't said? She is really a great professor. Gives plenty of opportunity to make a good grade, makes sure we're on schedule, and overall cares about this course and students. The material isn't that hard either. I absolutely recommend taking her if you can. You won't regret it.
Most definitely one of the best professors at Kennesaw State University. She is passionate, knowledgable, and dedicated to the success of her students. TAKE HER! YOU WON'T REGRET IT!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Dutcher is my favorite professor that I have had at KSU yet! She went above and beyond to support the class and help, especially through the quaratine fiasco. The way she lectures is incredible. She makes law very learnable. I could not recommend her more if I tried. Please take her!

If you need to take BLAW, TAKE PROFESSOR DUTCHER. Her exams come DIRECTLY from the powerpoints, she gives an ample amount of bonus points after each exam, and she's very accommodating to students. There are 4 tests, 3 easy projects (that you always get 100's on), and a final. I was nervous about this class until I walked in and saw Prof Dutcher!!!!

Be sure to NOT skip if you take this class (even though attendance isn't mandatory) and to take very good, very detailed notes. I loved this a lot and Dutcher is a really great teacher. The tests are a but difficult, but literally all of the assignments are completion based, so it all balances out to an A.
Absolutely loved Professor Dutcher! Her class is really interesting and she is a really fair grader who does everything she can to ensure her students get a good grade. I wish I could take her again!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: If I could take Dutcher for other classes, I would over & over again. Breaks down such a tough subject to make it super easy & approachable. Tests are all online with webcam but you can use a cheat sheet. Learnsmarts & writing assignments are done but they're so easy. Made it clear since day 1 that it is possible to get an A or B (which it is).

Dutcher made BLAW very easy and compact. You have to read, but if you aren't willing to read why are you in school? Super willing to work with you, amazing attitude, always brings her A game. Take her for BLAW!

She is very great! Provides all the help you need when ever you need it. She is very informative and very outgoing as a professor. Her test are a little of the hard side but if you study and pay attention in class, you should not have any problem.

Professor Dutcher is amazing! If i could take her for every single business related class, i would. Tests are online with webcam & lockdown but you're allowed to use a one sided cheat sheet, and she almost always has questions that she's specifically gone over in class. Attendance isn't mandatory, but show up for her lectures bc she makes it fun!

Best BLAW professor. She makes a very difficult subject easy and approachable. She is SO nice and caring. She does not bump, drop, or curve grades, but she doesn't need to because students tend to do well in her class because she is such an amazing professor. Take her if you can. There is no better professor in the entire department.

she lectures everyday but it was never boring. she is such an amazing teacher. I don't usually like subjects like this but i LOVED her class. her tests were DIRECTLY from her powerpoints and the hypothetical questions she posts on d2l. there is homework due every sunday but its easy. all tests are online with respondus lockdown & gives extra credit
Really nice professor, and you can tell she loves teaching and makes it really easy for you to get an A or B! Really enjoyed her class

I LOVED professor Dutcher. So knowledgeable and really cares about her students. 1 cheat sheet for every test, a couple extended responses, and a few chapter assignments, none of which are hard. Take her!!

Wow. Professor Dutcher is AMAZING at what she does. You will never be confused as to what you are supposed to do or how to get a good grade in this course. She is straight forward and gives great lectures. I wish she could be my professor for every course. Please take her if you can!
Great professor.

I took this course online over the summer and was a pretty easy class. While the tests are pretty difficult you should get 100% on everything else in the course and it will even out. Just one discussion and homework questions every week, 3 tests and cumulative final which the questions are pulled from the 3 tests. Tests are lockdown but open note

One of my favorite professors I've had so far! Very helpful, always gets grades in quickly, and replies to emails almost immediately. The tests are hard, I've failed two out of three so far, but there are extra credit opportunities and all the other assignments are very easy so they make up for the test.

Hands down best professor I had at KSU! Very knowledgeable, passionate, caring, and always ready to help. Easy class even for a summer semester. Be consistent and take good notes. You can use them during the test. She gives the answer to a few questions before the test. Easy A if you put in a little work. Opportunity for extra credit.

SHE IS AMAZING!! The class itself is easy but you have to take notes and read the book which are only a few pages per chapter. The tests are lockdown browser and video recorded but its open note. So make sure you take good notes for your tests.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Awesome professor. Shes great at communicating complex concepts and is passionate about teaching. You have multiple opportunities for extra credit. If you take those and just keep up with the class, you can expect an A. Take her!

Professor Dutcher is the best. She's worked in the field for years and really knows what she's teaching. Class is enjoyable and she makes an effort to really make sure you understand everything, especially the more challenging concepts. If you can take her, TAKE HER! If you put in minimal effort, it is an easy A.

I loved this class! Super easy, homework every week but nothing hard. Test - we had a note card for every test, they were not hard at all. The only reason you would fail is because you didn't care to try. Easy A!!

Professor Dutcher is AMAZING! Not only is she knowledgable about what shes teaching but her class is also very easy. As long as you do the work you will EASILY get a B and with little effort you can get an A. Tons of extra credit, gives some questions that will be on the test and grades fast.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Dutcher is very passionate and it's kind of awesome. She really cares about the students and makes everything interesting. She's a pretty awesome teacher. The tests I feel like Im failing when I take them but I do well somehow probably because she's actually a really good teacher and somehow I learn the material.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Great professor! She post PowerPoints of tough topics so you will have a better understanding. Tests are hard but you can use a notecard and there is extra credit which really helps. Do connect LearnSmart assignments and you will do fine in the class.

Tests were nearly impossible I didn't pass 1 besides the final lockdown browser and a camera for every test. Offers 45 extra credit points total. Weekly discussion, reading, & a good bit of HW. I finished with an A, but I really had to work for it. Teacher answers questions and gives feedback. Don't take this class if you don't want to put in work!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Glad to have taken this with Prf. Dutcher. Weekly discussion posts about chapter topic, weekly LearnSmarts that are easy when you read. 4 tests with extra credit for each test. Video lectures on most missed topics as well. Was fully prepared for the final. She definitely breaks everything down for you!

Professor Dutcher is one of the best! Very passionate, enthusiastic, and caring. Classes are mostly lectures with an activity every few weeks. Learnsmarts are due every week, but they're quick and easy. She knows that a lot of students aren't going into law so she doesn't make the class too hard. The tests are relatively easy. Take her!!

Best professor at KSU. Passionate, helpful, inspiring. Lectures are interesting and she is always willing to answer questions. Often goes the extra mile. Class is a fair amount of work but nothing too bad. I never felt overwhelmed. Just take her, you can't go wrong with her.

Great teacher but very lecture/test heavy. Tests are every two weeks with learnsmart homeworks due every week. easy to keep your grade up if you study hard. Extra credit at the end of the semester. reflections on "create a days" and tests (they're simple but come up often but help keep your grade up). She's a fantastic teacher, but lecture heavy

Prof. Dutcher is simply a great teacher. She is passionate, respectful, and kind. She is always easy to reach, always willing to help, and very clear on expectations. She also made an effort to learn everyone's name in the class and succeeded. Definitely take if you can! You will learn a lot and enjoy the material!
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: AWSOME PROFESSOR! I really enjoyed professor dutcher's class this semester. The way she lectures makes the material interesting and is open to/encourages class discussion which was helpful. I would 100% take her again. Easily my favorite course this semester.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--Would take again

comment: The grade is based mainly on 3 tests and the final. There is a homework package that you have to buy on connect for about $120 and is about 20% of your grade. The tests do require a lot of studying materials such as the PowerPoints and the practice questions on connect. Attendance is not required but recommended.
Take her class! Her lectures are very clear, is always willing to answer any questions you have, is very lenient with you no matter the issue, etc. etc. she's awesome!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: The test come right from the power-points. On the test she lets you use a notecard and there are six tests (but they each cover 2-3 chapters). Very light content on test and the note card works very well. She has so much knowledge over the subject and really knows how to teach this class, take her as your professor!!!!!

One of the easiest classes I've taken. No attendance. Tests are straight from powerpoints and stuff posted on D2L. She lets you use a notecard cheat sheet for every test. In class activities are super easy and she is helpful if you have questions. Definitely recommend.
Took her online over the summer. Easy A.
I really enjoyed this class and it was very easy and informative!
Super easy Discussions, super easy quizzes, super easy learnsmart assignments. You will not regret taking her!!!

Amazing professor! Class is super easy!! Every monday you have a learnsmart assignment  due at 12 PM not am which has unlimited attempts so there's no way you can fail it, unless you miss the deadline which happened to me twice :(. Friday you have a discussion and quiz. Both very easy. I HATE discussions but hers were so simple. I lover her!!

I took this class online.  TAKE THIS CLASS!  Dr. Dutcher is super nice, super responsive, and super organized.  I highly recommend taking her.  If you do the work and put in the time, you will get an A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Great teacher, very knowledgable. Doing the homework and quizzes in CONNECT is absolutely what will make or break you. Do it all and study moderately for tests, easy A. She knows her stuff and is willing to help with whatever you need. Most learning and work can honestly be done online. Very fair grading system that sets you up for success.

Amazing teacher very caring and wants you to succeed. She's passionate in what she does and gives multiple chances for extra credit. I took her online and was by far blown away on how easy it is to communicate if a problem arises. I would highly recommend her.
She was great! Go to class and do the weekly assignments. Tests are difficult, but they are online. She gives extra credit at the end of the semester!

The class was very easy. I made an A on everything, except the 2 tests that I did not pass. At the end of the semester, I expected to get a B, but instead i was shocked with a failing grade. I do not know how I fail this class , I only fail 2 test and missed a lot of classes. The teacher seems nice and easy, but I still do not how how I fail.
She is an awesome teacher. She is quick to respond to emails. Do you work and you will pass this class. She gives a decent amount of extra credit at the end of the semester.

Professor Dutcher is great! She is very clear on everything that needs to be done throughout the semester. Everything is laid out on the course schedule and all assignments are due at the same time every week, so you always know when your stuff is due. Very easy as long as you follow her guidelines. Highly recommended.

Her powerpoint are online, through it always doesn't cover everything you need, it will get you through the material. Not necessary to go everyday and she usually cancels Friday class, sometimes Wed. She loves what she does and is great at teaching it. Definitely do the extra credit. I only need a 9% on the final to keep my A (93), because of EC!

TAKE HER! Two tests, weekly online homework and quizzes, three short papers about an in class activity (free 100 as long as you follow format), and TONS of extra credit. Everything is online. Gives complete powerpoint notes so you don't have to go to class, but her lectures are always great! She knows how to give examples of everything she teaches!

She's very good. I love her. She's funny and engaging. You won't be bored in her class. Everyone speaks up in her class about the discussions because it deals with real life. Tests are online with lockdown browser. Homework is on Connect. Easy. If I didn't do all of my homework I wouldn't have passed. Homework made my A.

Great professor. I took her during summer and the homework and tests are all online and attendance is NOT mandatory. If less than 30% of the class shows up she gives extra credit however. Theres a good amount of homework but  never takes more than 10 minutes max. I 110% recommend her class for anyone. Lectures are thorough and usually short

I am extremely thankful that I took this class with Mrs. Dutcher. She gives the option for each student to earn at least 100 extra points. She cares deeply for each of her students and was  willing to answer all of my questions regarding law. She will never surprise you, her entire class is laid out in the syllabus. I highly recommend her.

Professor Dutcher's class had to be thee EASIEST A I've ever earned in any class I've ever taken. This class was a requirement because I'm a business major, but I enjoyed it. She's very clear about everything she assigns and expects. Get an online book (I got the hard copy too) :(  You can earn a bunch of extra credit pts. TAKE ADVANTAGE OF IT!!!

Cool professor, very good lecturer, and both papers were interesting and only had to be 3 pages (double spaced). But be warned: her tests are HARD. 70 multiple choice questions, and there was no easy way to study for them, given the volume of testable material (using the lectures as a study guide didn't help). But she does offer ample extra credit.

EASIEST A EVER IF YOU TAKE ONLINE. There is busy work but it's such an easy A. Monday nights a discussion board and quiz are due each week. She is very clear about what is due. Also offers extra credit that is available to submit any time during the semester. Buy the online access code for Cengage/ not book. (this is for online)
The best professor I have taken at KSU yet.

AMAZING, AMAZING, AMAZING! If you do not take Professor Dutcher you are doing yourself a disservice. She is so helpful, her online course is an easy A but interesting, she gives extra credit and her expectations are extremely clear. She sends weekly updates about what is due and seems like she really cares about her students. You have to take her!

Believe all the other ratings - this professor is awesome! She really goes out of her way to help her students succeed. Class was a breeze, very straightforward and structured. I don't think she teaches any other classes I need - but if she did I would take her in a heartbeat.

Prof Dutcher is a good, knowledgeable professor that truly wants her students to learn and succeed. Mastery of the content is through repetition: read the material, watch a VoD lecture, and then logon to Cengage to do the homework and take a quiz. Many graded assignments. Many opportunities for bonus points. Would definitely take her again.
just believe me when I say this class is one of the easiest A's you will get at KSU, nuff said

I took her online and she gives you all tools to help you on test.  There is weekly work to do and she lets you know the first day of that week what all is due.  So there is no surprises.  I will take her again if she teaches a class I need.

Professor Dutcher was amazing, probably one of my easiest teachers in college so far. She gives you usually one or two quizzes online each week, and every month, a short 20 minute assignment, also online. Tests, there are four, also online, and final is mandatory, in class. Pretty easy A, would definately take her again.
Professor Dutcher is great! I found the subject boring but she does a good job of making it more interesting. There is a ton of extra credit. As long as you put in the work you can make an A easily.
TAKE THIS CLASS! Professor Dutcher is awesome!!! This online course is the easiest class I have ever taken. You will not regret it.

TAKE HER!!!!! She's an amazing professor. Offers enough extra credit to bump you up an entire letter grade and its easy extra credit. Also gives assignments that are the same weight as test grades AND drops the lowest test grade. EASY A!!!

GREAT PROFESSOR! THE BEST AT KSU!  I had her for a night class & she made the information interesting & easy to understand. EASY A if you do the work! Exam q's from Cengage. Don't buy law book, just Cengage and Handbook. Offers extra credit whole letter grade! TAKE HER!

Easiest A you will ever get in college! All of the tests and homework assignments are online. Do assignments unlimited times until you get a 100. Her lectures are even on YouTube so you really don't have to go to class- they are the same thing. Gives extra credit. Very passionate and helpful! Gives bonus questions as well. TAKE HER!

I took the class online and so happy I did. All tests were online and there was unlimited amount of time. The homework was  easy to do because you have unlimited tries and multiple chances on the questions. This professor is nice and very helpful if you have a question. Take her!!!

Very helpful and passionate about her job and teaching. The test and homework are not timed so youre not pressured. Test are not easy so make sure you read chapters and powerpoints. Anyone can get an A if you do the work.

Great teacher.  Makes everything more understandable than the way the book puts it.  Everything is online and she gives out plenty of extra credit.  It's almost impossible to make a low grade in this class unless you don't try at all.
great teacher. go to class. listen to lectures and take notes. homework assignments are easy and so are test since they are online. she is a very good speaker and helps you understand everything.

Very kind, caring, and concise professor. She does everything she can to help you succeed. I found the material to be challenging to me personally, but I applied myself and pretty easily got an A. I have also solidified the fact that I NEVER want to be a lawyer. Too many right answers was GENERALLY the situation with questions. Great professor.
Best professor ever, one of the easiest courses I have taken. Gives lots of extra credit, Unless youre just plain out lazy, you definitely CANNOT fail her course

Amazing professor! Class is straight forward with powerpoints. She gives examples that will stick in your head to help you remember. 4 tests AND a final. Final replaces lowest test grade. Tests are really hard but she hands out A LOTof extra credit. Only class where I've failed all but one test and still got an A. Easy A if you do the extra credit.

Awesome class. Don't buy the expensive West Law text book. From Cengage students can access the text from Study Tools section. Fill in the blanks PPT slides are annoying but worth attending class. She takes her time and tests straight from materials. Extra credit options saved my grade, I got an A.

Make sure you just buy the Cengage Online. From the Study Tools section the site lets you access the text book for limited periods of time. It can be accessed from the Study Quiz Section as well. Do the extra credit, go to class = you will make an A.

Took this course over the summer, and thankful that I did. Prof Dutcher is so laid back, and there is no excuse for not getting an A in this class. She gives extra credit opportunity that (if you take advantage of, and do the homework) you will walk out with an A. I highly recommend taking this course with her!

Easy class. The Homework and all tests but the final are online. She gives tons of opportunities for extra credit. The material is boring and c be confusing but shes great at providing examples and relating it to current situations. Responds to emails in timely manner

TAKE HER!Amazing teacher! Makes the subject intersting. The class is part online. Easy homework each week and test are online. Offers extra credit. MUST TAKE HER!!! I would take her again if she taught another class I needed!!

Professor Dutcher is extremely helpful and wants her students to succeed. I took her online class and she was an exceptional teacher. I learned a lot from her. I would highly recommend taking her class.

TAKE HER IF YOU CAN! She is wonderful. She explains everything thoroughly and the tests are online and easy. I didn't study for the final and got a B on it and ended up with a 97% in the class. Just do the homework (so easy) and you'll be golden. She offers extra credit and I actually enjoyed the class. She is great!!!!
Fantastic teacher! Knows her material through and through, and conveys the information in a meaningful way! Organized, delivered grades in a timely manner. A pleasure to be in her class!

I took her class online, and it was extremely easy. She posts lectures, and powerpoints online. There are weekly study tools and homework, but they are so easy if you just do them. The tests are more difficult, but nothing is timed so it's easy as pie.

I took her class online and thought it was easy to understand.  Professor Dutcher is very knowledgeable in her field.  The class itself was easy and didn't really require much effort.  Weekly homework and quizzes that you can take more than once.  The tests can be a little tricky because most of the questions are based on hypothetical situations.

Prof. Dutcher makes the material interesting and she helps you in anyway that she can. The homework is very easy and worth a high percentage of your grade, the tests are online, and the answers for the exercises are in the back of the book. Take her if you get the chance!

Took it online. This class is ridiculously easy! It was annoying that we had to purchase a workbook that she wrote. There were only two assignments from it. Worthless. Homework, quizzes and exams are straight from the textbook. Some exam questions are tricky, but she is very helpful. Easiest A I ever earned!

The class is an easy A with a lot of busy work. One thing I didn't like about her is how she would always change the students questions to make them correct instead of telling them they are wrong. It drove me crazy all semester.

I really enjoyed her class. She's a great teacher and really enjoys what she's teaching, which makes it better for students. She always took the time to answer questions and make sure we understood the material. My grade was lower only because I was so forgetful when it came to the online homework. Her teaching ability is great!
OMG!!!! YOU HAVE TO TAKE HER SHE MAKES IT VERY EASY TO MAKE AN A.

Great course for online.  Weekly homework and quiz, non-required bonus discussion forums, and workbook assignments that are more-or-less cut and paste once you find the answer.  Test questions and answers are never perfectly clear but I guess law isn't anyway.  Tests count for about 1/3rd of grade and the other assignments should be easy A's.

Prof. Dutcher is very passionate about the law. She is an outstanding instructor and will help anyway she can! She posts all of her powerpoints and attendance is not mandatory but you should ABSOLUTELY go to class, she gives hints and special insight into the tests to those few who regularly attend class. I would absolutely take her again!!!

She makes it fairly easy to get an A.  I took the class on campus.  While attendance isn't mandatory, there are often hints that will help you on tests.  There are 4 online tests, one Cengage assignment per chapter, 3 assignments from the workbook she wrote, and the final (which is in class).  I'd recommend her.
Took her online. Very easy class. You need to do your assignments, read the textbook, and participate in her online discussions and I guarantee you will do well.

Loved Prof. Dutcher. She made the class very interesting. Four tests online, final in class. She makes it VERY easy to get an A, and will bump your grade. She even gave me outside advice on a legal problem I had. Take her!!
I took blaw online. She is a good teacher. very knowledgeable. test are a little tricky however if you do the homework and other assignments you will pass. She also gives extra credit.
Good teacher. Her lectures are kind of boring, and her online test are pretty hard. If you study the notes and finish all the HW and other assigments you will do good.

I really recommend her to all students. I thought that BLAW 2200 is hard subject, but I am wrong because Ms. Cristen is a wonderful teacher ever. She gives you many extra credit. Her lectures is so clear, helpful and she explains them very clearly. She helps and answers every questions you asked very quickly. She has a wide scholar about BLAW.

Prof. Dutcher is an awesome professor.  She knows the material extremely well and is very interesting in class.  Although attendance is not required, I highly recommend you always attend class.  There is often info. given only during class.  Prof. Dutcher does a great job!

This teacher saved my butt! I needed an A in this class to get into Coles College and she bumped my 89 up at the end of the semester! Other than that, this class was very enjoyable and interesting. 2 tests were in class, 2 were online. Low Textbook use. I don't recommend paying for the book. Her powerpoints were very thorough.
WONDERFUL, WONDERFUL, WONDERFUL!!
Just an overall great professor.

Great professor who knows the material extremely well. Tests are hard, but go to class and study the Power points and you will do fine. She gives extra credit, but don't count on that to get an A...must study.
Very nice teacher. I missed tons of classes but studied hard for the tests w/ my book and made an A. She offers lots of extra credit.
good teacher but test r hard!!! lot of memorizing. personally i can't memorize so i did bad in her course but take her if u r good at it!! gives out extra credit!!!

It it so great to have a prof who is passionate about their subject. She is younger so probably new but teaches like a pro. Very willing to help students and clarify any problems. Easy to get in contact with. Tests are tough but attend class and study and you can pull an A. Definitely recommend her!

Dutcher is really nice and knows about law. She explains things really well and is always happy to re explain or answer questions. Shes covers a lot of material and it is not easy but you learn so much! Tests are hard but if you attend class and study you can get an A.
Great Professor. Study for the tests and ask questions and you'll do fine.
Pretty easy class. Test can be can of tricky, but study the power points and you will be fine. She is very nice and helpful.

Great Professor. She has a passion for law and is able to break down the law in such a simplistic way. The test are not bad,but make sure you study. Extra credit was provided which is always a plus. I would suggest you take this professor.

Not a bad class for a required course. Prof. Dutcher obviously has a passion for her subject matter, which was just interesting to me.  Tests were tough, but Prof. Dutcher was generous with extra credit and outside class help if you asked for it.  I recommend her class, just be sure to study for the tests,  her lecture notes are great for that.

It was quite obvious that it was Prof. Dutcher's first year teaching.  She really appeared to have no idea how to run a class.  Assignments were few, but her tests were very unclear. We did not use to book other than for the Case writing assignment. She sent out reviews for tests, but questions on test were too vague and she was not helpful.
